====================
Downstream Analyses
====================

These are tutorials for downstream processing of ChIP-seq and ATAC-seq data.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   Annotation using ChIPpeakAnno
   Annotation using ChIPseeker <chipseeker/lab-ChIPseeker.rst>
   Detection of differential binding sites using csaw <csaw/lab-csaw.rst>
   Detection of differential binding sites using DiffBind local <diffBind/lab-diffBinding-local.rst>
   Detection of differential binding sites using DiffBind remote <diffBind/lab-diffBinding-remote.rst>
   Identification of sequence motifs <motifs/lab-motifs.rst>
